{"id":416379272,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1604416239,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/416379272/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"7.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxPower(string s) {\n        int ans = 1;\n        int len = 1;\n        for (int i = 1; i < s.length(); ++i) {\n            if (s[i] == s[i - 1]) {\n                ++len;\n                ans = max(ans, len);\n            } else {\n                len = 1;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
